title: Unified cgalpha namespace
rationale: Consolidate all source code under single top-level package cgalpha/ to eliminate confusion between aipha/cgalpha namespaces

title: Clean Architecture with Ports & Adapters
rationale: Apply Clean Architecture with explicit Port interfaces at every layer boundary to enable isolated testing
impact: More files (ports directory), composition root required

title: Decompose SimpleCausalAnalyzer into Pipeline
rationale: The 1460-LOC God Class violates SRP with 7 responsibilities. Decompose into 6 focused classes behind CausalAnalysisPipeline facade
impact: Major refactoring of causal analysis module

title: Dependency Injection via Composition Root
rationale: Replace all singletons with explicit constructor injection. Single bootstrap.py wires everything together
impact: Constructor parameter lists may grow, but testability improves dramatically

title: ProjectPaths value object
rationale: Create single ProjectPaths value object that calculates all paths relative to configurable root, eliminating 10+ hardcoded paths

title: Separate v2 codebase in parallel directory
rationale: Avoid conflicts with existing code by creating cgalpha_v2/ parallel to cgalpha/. This allows safe migration without breaking existing functionality
impact: Requires final integration step to merge v2 into main package

title: Use frozen dataclasses for all Value Objects
rationale: Immutability prevents bugs from accidental mutation. All domain models should be frozen=True
impact: All VOs are immutable, requires __post_init__ for validation

title: Actor-Critic workflow for reconstruction
rationale: Use dual-LLM approach: CRITIC (advanced LLM) designs and reviews, ACTOR (local LLM) implements. This eliminates single-LLM overconfidence errors

title: Context persistence for LLM continuity
rationale: Store all decisions, changes, and migration status in .context/ directory with JSONL format for easy LLM consumption
impact: LLMs can resume work with full context awareness
